ModMetaData.name: No dead man's apparel for Armors and helmets
ModMetaData.author: Blue9
ModMetaData.description: Makes all armor like apparel to work like belts, they don't get the "D" of dead man's apparel. Will work with modded stuff as long as they have ArmorMakeableBase or ArmorHelmetMakeableBase as ParentName in their def
